name: Sugar Kingdom
description: Sugar Kingdom is a Metaverse focused on casual games, emphasizing the player experience, allowing the generation of a status system, high customization and several games that coexist within the platform. Sugar Kingdom includes: A complete range of casual games with universally validated mechanics. The possibility to stand out from the other players and become a Duke, a Prince or a King. Participate in community events, earning and having fun. Being able to play in the LANDs of your favorite content creators and celebrities. CANDY is the native utility token that is used for: Buy and customize NFTs and LANDs. Participate in tournaments and challenges. Enjoy the Defi features within the platform.
